name: Plantea Shop

name: Sky Support
text: Web application designed to provide a space of inspiration and enhanced focus. The app offers personalized sky images, greek pilosophical quotes and soothing sounds.

name: Emotions Assistant
text: SPA designed to assist users in process of emotional integration. The app offers breathing exercises, space for journaling and helpful resources.
